title: Update release schedule
body:
Hey guys, loving the client so far.

I was just wondering if there was an update release schedule we could follow along with?

I understand that the development team would be working with a loose schedule and that just because it says on it, for example "update 23rd June", the update could be delayed. And that's fine, I'm not, and I'm sure others aren't, going to lynch you for not releasing an update on time because of complications.

I also don't want to start a whole "we should know everything that's going on at Riot HQ", but it would be pretty cool if we could go "hey an update is coming soon, yay!"

Either way, love your work guys <3

replies.body:
Hi!

Glad you are liking what you see! (me too!)

We *do* have a spot that you can go to see what are working on - it is listed on the alpha microsite - http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/client-update/news

In the "Up Next" section you can see the feature set we'll be looking into in the next release (currently Profiles), and we'll be keeping that up to date as things move forward.   Expect some updated info there in the coming days!

Cheers
Mindstar

Jeez, I must be the illegitimate child of Lee Sin and Rek'Sai to be this blind.

Thanks Mindstar! :D

If you go on surrenderat20.net you will find some information. They have released profiles to the PBE Alpha Client. However... "The following content has been testing on the PBE but will not be going to live in the patch." It then continues with...

"As the League Client Update continues to test on the PBE, the update profile page now working on the PBE LCU! Here's CapnBranFlakes with more information:

"===UPDATE: 18 MAY 2016===

Hi League client update PBE testers! 

We shared some information yesterday about a preview of the Profile page -- it's now accessible on the PBE alpha client, and still just as barebones as mentioned in that link. Reminder! We'll roll out more fleshed-out Profile pages in the coming weeks, so until then, please continue to keep your testing focused on Summoner's Rift and ARAM. 

Thanks again for joining us on the frontline!""

I would recommend you to check this site out in the future. For more info go to: http://www.surrenderat20.net/p/current-pbe-balance-changes.html
